description: Tracks the 14 mood axes that define a character's current affective/regulatory state. Each axis ranges from -100 to +100.

valence.description: Pleasant (+) to unpleasant (-). Overall hedonic tone.

future_expectancy.description: Hopeful (+) to hopeless (-). Belief in positive outcomes.

temporal_orientation.description: Future-focused (+) to past-focused (-). Mental time direction. +100=strongly future-oriented (planning, anticipation), 0=present-focused (flow, mindfulness), -100=strongly past-oriented (reminiscence, rumination, nostalgia).

affiliation.description: Social warmth and connectedness. Captures momentary interpersonal orientation. (-100=cold/detached/hostile, 0=neutral, +100=warm/connected/affiliative)

uncertainty.description: Model fit / cognitive clarity. +100 = highly uncertain / cannot integrate; -100 = highly certain / coherent model.

contamination_salience.description: Non-contaminating/neutral (-) to highly contaminating/revolting (+). Visceral repulsion / pathogen-purity salience; distinct from danger (threat) and from social distance (affiliation).

rumination.description: Mentally flexible/easy disengagement (-) to sticky repetitive replay (+). Perseveration, obsessive review, intrusive thoughts.

evaluation_pressure.description: Not scrutinized/unobserved (-) to intensely scrutinized/being judged (+). Social-evaluative exposure, being watched, performance context. Distinct from threat (danger) and self_evaluation (self-worth).
